definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Quinn went to Albany, the state capital, and began knocking on doors.
sentences.chinese: 奎因到紐約的首府奧爾巴尼，開始到處走訪。

sentences.english: The work will be performed in Albany, Ga. The Marine Corps Systems Command is the contracting activity.
sentences.chinese: 這項工作將在佐治亞州奧爾巴尼進行。

sentences.english: One of my students from Albany, NY was suffering from bouts of severe depression.
sentences.chinese: 我一個來自紐約奧爾巴尼的學生曾患有嚴重的抑鬱症。
